title: Leukoencephalopathy with Brain Stem and Spinal Cord Involvement and Lactate Elevation (LBSL)
short_description: Clinical document about LBSL, an extremely rare neurological disorder first reported in 2002 with approximately 100 identified cases worldwide as of 2018.
long_description: This document provides information about Leukoencephalopathy with Brain Stem and Spinal Cord Involvement and Lactate Elevation (LBSL), a rare neurological disorder that was first documented in medical literature in 2002. The document highlights the extreme rarity of this condition, citing data from the nonprofit organization A Cure for Ellie indicating that only about 100 individuals worldwide had been identified with LBSL as of April 2018. The text emphasizes the challenges in determining the true prevalence of LBSL and similar rare diseases due to frequent underdiagnosis and misdiagnosis in clinical practice.
